articles.title: Al-Ittihad interested in summer deal for Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes - Man United News And Transfer News - The Peoples Person
articles.description: Saudi Arabia Pro League giants Al-Ittihad are reportedly keen on making a summer swoop for Manchester United midfielder Bruno Fernandes. Despite United's struggles this season, Fernandes has still managed to put up impressive numbers. The Portugal internation…
articles.content:
36Saudi Arabia Pro League giants Al-Ittihad are reportedly keen on making a summer swoop for Manchester United midfielder Bruno Fernandes.
